Description: Job Overview:We are seeking a skilled and experienced E-commerce Website Developer and Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both web development and design, with a focus on creating functional and visually appealing e-commerce websites. This role requires expertise in various e-commerce platforms, a keen eye for design, and the ability to work independently to bring projects to completion.Responsibilities:- Collaborate with clients and project stakeholders to understand project requirements and objectives.- Develop and design e-commerce websites that align with clients' brand identity and business goals.- Create and implement custom features, functionality, and enhancements for e-commerce platforms.- Utilize front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) to ensure seamless user experiences.- Integrate and configure third-party tools, plugins, and APIs for payment gateways, shipping options, and more.- Optimize websites for performance, speed, and responsiveness across devices.- Design visually appealing user interfaces, including layouts, graphics, and multimedia elements.- Develop and implement SEO best practices to enhance website visibility and search engine rankings.- Troubleshoot and resolve any technical or design issues that arise during the development process.- Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices related to e-commerce and web development.Skills
Skills: - Proven experience as a web developer with a strong portfolio showcasing both e-commerce development and design work.
- Proficiency in e-commerce platforms such as Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, BigCommerce, etc.
- Expertise in front-end technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript) and responsive design principles.
- Familiarity with backend technologies, databases, and server-side scripting languages.
- Ability to work with design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.).
- Strong understanding of UX/UI design principles and user-centered design methodologies.
- Experience with SEO best practices and website optimization.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot technical issues.
- Effective communication skills to interact with clients, team members, and stakeholders.
- Time management skills to meet project deadlines and handle multiple projects simultaneously.
- Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
